body:
Hi Walter,


Sounds like you just need to go get Exiftool again from:


	http://www.sno.phy.queensu.ca/~phil/exiftool/


and reinstall it.  It uses multiple modules, which the installer takes care of for you if I remember right.


Cheers,
-Greg
